Text.val: 06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select count(*)
from :1/BTPC BTPC, :1/BTCH BTCH, :1/CLNT CLNT where BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID = BTCH.BTCH_ID and CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO and BTCH.BTCH_DATE between ':2' and ':3' and BTCH.BTCH_BATCHCODE = 'K'

select BTCH.BTCH_ID, BTCH.BTCH_DATE, BTCH.BTCH_BATCHCODE, BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC.BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRH, BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRPAY, BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO, CLNT.CLNT108_ACC_CURR from :1/BTPC BTPC, :1/BTCH BTCH, :1/CLNT CLNT where BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID = BTCH.BTCH_ID and CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO and BTCH.BTCH_DATE between ':2' and ':3' and BTCH.BTCH_BATCHCODE = 'K'
